rules_text:
Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
Fabled {2}{R}{R} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature
During your turn, enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and you control enchanted creature. [i](It’s unaffected by summoning sickness if you’ve controlled it since the start of your turn.)[/i]
